Class MavenLogTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target.MavenLogTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionTarget

    public class MavenLogTarget
extends Object
implements ExecutionTarget
    An ExecutionTarget that writes digests to a Maven Log.

    1.0
